metadata.title: CVE-2022-25147 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_base64 functions ofApache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) allows an attacker to writebeyond bounds of a buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable RuntimeUtility (APR-util) 1.6.1 and prior versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libaprutil1 - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
libaprutil1-dbd-mysql - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
libaprutil1-dbd-odbc - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
libaprutil1-dbd-pgsql - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
libaprutil1-dbd-sqlite3 - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
libaprutil1-ldap - 1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apr-util package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.1-4ubuntu2.1').
